name: admin.teams.list
desc: List all teams in an Enterprise organization

cursor.desc: Set `cursor` to `next_cursor` returned by the previous call to list items in the next page.

limit.desc: The maximum number of items to return. Must be a positive integer no larger than 1000.

errors.feature_not_enabled: The Admin APIs feature is not enabled for this team.
errors.invalid_limit: Value passed for `limit` was not valid.
errors.not_an_admin: This method is only accessible by org owners and admins.
